name: A Knight's Quest ~ Duology ~
description:
(These set of games were created for my university assignments. So here they are in a name your price bundle. More info is explained within the games.)

~ A Knight's Quest ~

A knight travels forth to rescue a princess from a dragon who lives in a tall tower. A tale as old as time. What could possibly go wrong? Take control of Sir Knightingale as he travels through the land of Reignland since you can pick his route, and see where the story takes you and him? Rescue the princess or do what else knows? Only one way to find out.

~ A Knight's Quest 2 The Holy Grail ~

Becoming the leader of the Knight of Reign, Sir Knightingale sets forth to complete a task that will put his name in history. To collect the Holy Grail. Travel to the Grail Chamber and tackle through all its tricks, traps and games to collect the grail and escape.

Many secrets are revealed about the world of A Knight's Quest within this saga of the story. What are they? You just have to play to find out what lies beneath the mask. 

BONUS: This pack gives you the prequel story: A King's View. A game made with Twine because... I had to for a homework project. Take control of the King as you decide the fate of the Kingdom of Reignland.

Created with my Armatelum GMS2 Engine from 2019 and 2020.

Make sure to also try out Armatelum Showdown, as Sir Knightingale is a playable character in this game! https://j5-the-hyperforce.itch.io/armatelum-showdown
